wikipedia_page.main: John Buchanan Monteith (5 December 1883 – 27 September 1918) was a Scottish professional football right back who played in the Scottish League for Queen's Park.

response: John Monteith is a British scientist.
John Monteith may also refer to:
* John Monteith (minister) (1788–1868), co-founder of the University of Michigan
